p: Table 3 shows the chemical composition of flours from raw and pre-treated red and black-eye varieties. Pre-treating seeds decreased moisture content of flour, as also reported by Yusuf, Ayedun [ 37]. Moisture content of flour from red and black-eye seeds, i.e. 7.7 and 9.1%, respectively, was lower than the 11.3â€“11.6% reported by [ 34], but higher than the 4.3% reported by Yusuf, Ayedun [ 37].
